post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
Here you will see how easy it is to create a breakable glass window, everything can ofcourse be breakable with this method, this tutorial covers the window though.

post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
Hahaha, thanx.

Nah, not really my job, though I 'run' a free Video Tutorial page *cough* *pimping* *cough*.

I just enjoy helping people and since I've had to figure out most of this stuff myself Instead of writing a detailed tutorial I think it's easier to show with a video, and also some people (including myself), thinks it's easier to learn from videos than from text (especially when you have 2 monitors setup)
